resources:
Hire him! Hire him! Settings Language Settings Hello World from section: %1$d General Experience Other Call SMS Exit Language +46000000000 // temp 0000000@gmail.com // temp 0000000 //imie nazwisko Telephone: E-Mail Address: Karolina //temp Michael //temp Grzegorz //temp +48 0 //temp +48 0 //temp +48 0 //temp Direct manager, Officer Indirect manager, Officer Indirect manager, Officer Linkedin recommendations https://www.linkedin.com/00000000 //temp E-Mail Employment opportunity English Svenska Polski العربية Empty setting Apply Intern Tax Office in Żywiec 07/2012 Intern Accounting office BRMS sp. z o.o. 07/2013 Pricing Analyst State Street Bank GmbH 09/2013 - 10/2014 Senior Pricing Analyst State Street Bank GmbH 11/2014 - 07/2016 Dear Sir or Madam,

	 I am currently looking for career opportunities in financial sector, and if there is such option I would gladly discuss with you, possibility of me joining your company.

	 I've started working for State Street Bank just after finishing my studies on Cracow University of Economics. Because I've been interested in computers since kid, very quickly I've been considered as go-to person in case of any hardware/software problems and my team members in most cases preferred to ask me for help before opening ticket for IT dept. I really like making my and others life easier, that's why, since my very first months in State Street I have been creating macros and tools aiming in reduction of operational risk and time spent.

	 Due to my gained skills, will to develop and volunteer in department affairs, I've been taking part in projects affecting whole department (~120 people). Thanks to that I've opportunity to take part in projects initiation, planning, development and implementation. I am eager to learn anything that may improve work quality. I've gained my supervisor's trust and few times represented our team/department on meetings with internal or external auditors (EY).

	 I really like working on large data, that's why I was responsible for preparing reports for senior management and oversight (UK's branch officers), basing on data gathered daily regarding every task of every client in every team within department.

	 Another thing I enjoyed in my previous role was VBA development. As my skills grown, supervisor or officer assigned me to more challenging projects. In last months as senior pricing analyst, up to 80% of my daily agenda was reserved for programming. If you are reading this letter between 6 A.M. and 8 P.M. CET, someone surly at this moment is using tool/solution I made. Currently I'm learning Java, thinking about VB .NET in future, but I can switch to whatever language that may be beneficial for your company.

 Previously I had two internships, in Accounting office and Polish Skatteverket. In both I got a reputation of being person who is reliable, scrupulous and carefully doing its tasks also my creativity in problem solving and ability to cooperate with other employees have been noticed.

	 For recommendations on LinkedIn website please check option in menu.

	 I've come to Sweden in August this year, my Swedish improves every day however still requires some time to be fluent. I strongly believe that working for your organization can bring me more opportunities to develop myself. Basing on brief description of my previous experience I think I might be valuable asset within your company. In that regard, I would appreciate opportunity to meet with you and discuss about my qualifications and possibility to join you organization. Should you require any additional information, please do not hesitate to contact me.

 Yours faithfully,
 Marek Jan Pasierbek Speach Writing Education Languages Skills References English Polish Swedish Cracow University of Economics Finance and Accounting 2010 - 2013: Bachelor degree Visual Basic for Applications – Advanced MS Office (especially MS Excel and Access) Bloomberg and Reuters terminals Experience of working in fund administration Ability to work under pressure of time Detail – oriented Strong analytical skills Teamwork skills Fast learner Java - Basic Participating in team and department wide projects (mostly as VBA developer) Preparing accuracy and timelines reports for senior management and oversight Covering technical side of transformation to paperless business Assigning responsibilities to team members and ensuring team effectiveness during supervisor absence Valuation shares, bonds, futures, options and verification their price on Bloomberg, Reuters or IDC Developing and implementing tools made to improve process by time spent and risk reduction Checking quality of valuations made by other employes Resolving clients and fund accountants queries regarding pricing Teaching less experienced staff with business process and additional matters Entering cost documents, banks statements, fixed assets to accounting software CDN XL (Comarch ERP) Account for employee’s advances and accounting records Aligning accounting documentation Preparing records and assignments of received documents Checking validity of received tax statement corrections Registration and processing forms sent by outer institutions (i.e. Social Insurance Agency)
